employees.notes: Proff lists the company with 25 employees; the page does not explicitly timestamp this employee count beyond being current profile data.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports "Sum driftsinntekter 2024 332 761" and states "Beløp i 1000", so revenue is recorded as NOK 332,761,000.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: The legal entity is confirmed as METALLCO ALUMINIUM AS with org number 963419511 on Proff.[1] A norskeutslipp permit extract shows org number 972166995 as bedrift/underenhet, indicating a facility-level identifier rather than the parent legal entity.[3]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Metallco Aluminium AS describes its alloy production as based on recycled aluminium scrap inputs, indicating SRM as a core feedstock for operations.[2] No audited inbound SRM mass figure was found in the reviewed public sources.[2][3]

srm_inputs.label: Recycled aluminium scrap feedstock
srm_inputs.used_for: Used as the main feedstock for melting/remelting and producing secondary aluminium foundry alloys.[2]
srm_inputs.tier_reasoning: The company states all alloys are produced from recycled aluminium and all production is based on melting used aluminium scrap, which indicates core dependence on SRM input.[2]

share.context: The company states that all alloys are produced from recycled aluminium and that all production is based on melting used aluminium scrap.[2]

srm_inputs.volume_notes: Public company text reports production volumes (about 15,000 tonnes alloys and up to 5,000 tonnes toll remelting), which indicates industrial scale but not a direct measured inbound SRM tonnage disclosure.[2]
srm_inputs.uncertainties: No explicit annual inbound scrap mass balance (actual received/purchased SRM) was identified in the reviewed pages and permit extract.[2][3]

gaps_and_uncertainties: No source found with audited annual inbound aluminium scrap quantity for this legal entity/facility.[2][3]
Permit extract confirms facility classification but does not provide a clear annual actual SRM input-use figure in the extracted text.[3][4]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn METALLCO ALUMINIUM AS Org nr 963 419 511
evidence.claim: Confirms legal name and organization number.
Supports reported operating revenue figure for 2024.
Indicates revenue figures are presented in thousands NOK.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Alle legeringene er produsert ut ifra gjenvunnet (resirkulert) aluminium.
evidence.claim: Shows recycled aluminium is the feedstock basis.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Råvarene er aluminiumskrap fra gjenvinningstasjoner, skraphandlere og spon og kapp fra maskinering av aluminium.
evidence.claim: Specifies inbound secondary raw material types and origins.

evidence.evidence_snippet: All vår produksjon er basert på å smelte brukt aluminium (skrap).
evidence.claim: States all production is based on used aluminium scrap.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Metallco Aluminium AS produserer pr i dag ca 15.000 tonn støpelegeringer.
evidence.claim: Indicates production scale relevant to SRM use significance.
Shows facility-level organization number in permit extract.

sources.title: Metallco Aluminium AS - Org.nr. 963 419 511 - Eina - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
